summary: Frontend testing completed for Report Templates feature. All 8 requested features verified and working correctly. 10 professional report templates are available with category filtering and proper application.

issues: Console warning: 'Missing Description or aria-describedby' for DialogContent - minor accessibility issue (same as iteration_21)

frontend: Templates button visible in Report Builder header with purple gradient (data-testid='templates-btn')
Templates modal opens when clicking Templates button
Modal displays 'Report Templates' title with LayoutTemplate icon
All 10 category filter tabs present: All, Finance, Executive, Sales, Marketing, HR, Project Management, Customer Success, Product, Operations
Category filtering works - Finance filter shows only 2 templates (Quarterly Business Summary, Financial Statement)
10 template cards displayed with data-testids (template-quarterly_summary, template-executive_report, etc.)
Template cards show gradient preview header matching template theme
Template cards display name, description, section count, and category badge
Templates with coverPage: true show 'Cover' badge on card
Clicking Quarterly Business Summary applies template - title changes to 'Q4 2025 Business Summary'
Cover page auto-enabled for templates with coverPage: true
Confidentiality level set correctly - Executive Report sets 'Confidential', Quarterly Summary sets 'Internal'
Success toast appears - 'Applied "Quarterly Business Summary" template!'
Sales Dashboard template (no cover page) correctly does NOT enable cover page toggle
Sections count matches template definition (7 sections for Quarterly, 6 for Sales Dashboard)
Template themes applied - gradient colors change based on template theme

critical_code_review_comments: Minor accessibility: Dialog component missing aria-describedby - consider adding description for screen readers (low priority, same as iteration_21)
context_for_next_testing_agent: Report Templates feature fully verified. 10 templates available: quarterly_summary, executive_report, sales_dashboard, marketing_analytics, hr_report, project_status, financial_statement, customer_insights, product_analytics, operational_report. Templates modal opened via purple 'Templates' button in header. Category tabs filter templates. Click template card to apply. Templates with coverPage: true auto-enable cover page toggle and set confidentiality level. Navigation: Export -> Report Builder.
